title: Charlotte Uptown City Break near Romare Bearden Park with Rooftop Bar
description: Discover Charlotte’s countless charms with a stay at Kimpton Tryon Park Hotel, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned between sculpture-filled Romare Bearden Park and Uptown, the city’s happening business district. Catch a ball game at nearby Truist Field and return to easygoing antipasto and woodfired pizza at Angeline’s or artisanal cocktails served on the hotel’s rooftop at Merchant + Trade, surrounded by the city’s breathtaking skyline.
location_description: Kimpton Tryon Park Hotel, an IHG Hotel
